column4: and it will be worth the effort to read a few of the beginner linux guides at the ubuntu homepage.
my question was does anyone know how to make a vcd for use in home dvd players
like what app you would need
ahh.. thats somthing ive never really tried.. there is "kino" and "k3b" but ive never made a video-dvd with them
um how do i convert a .avi file to a .mpeg or .mpg1 file?
so i can make a vcd
um it's not out in the states yet lol
find a spanish server, or channel and join it. :P like #ubuntu-es
so theres no easy way to do that huh?
fighting with all the different codec/video formats is the hard part. :P
is there a program that can do that or something?
or another one that can wright .avi to vcd?
it may be time to do some googling and looking in the forums. this is an area that is full of pitfalls. sadly.
ok that you for your help
